name: Southern California Edison Preferred Stock
description: Southern California Edison (SCE) is a major electric utility that provides reliable and safe electricity to millions of customers in Southern California. As a subsidiary of Edison International, SCE is committed to delivering clean energy solutions and promoting sustainability. The company plays a crucial role in the transition to renewable energy, focusing on reducing greenhouse gas emissions and enhancing energy efficiency. SCE invests in advanced technologies and infrastructure to improve grid reliability and integrate renewable resources like solar and wind energy. Through various programs, SCE supports customers in adopting energy-efficient practices and utilizing clean energy alternatives. The company also prioritizes community engagement and environmental stewardship, ensuring that it meets the energy needs of its diverse customer base while contributing to a sustainable future. SCE's efforts include initiatives for electric vehicle charging infrastructure and incentives for solar generation, assisting California in its ambitious climate goals. As a preferred stock issuer, SCE offers unique investment opportunities for those looking to participate in the growth of the utility sector while supporting clean energy advancements.

faq.question: What does Southern California Edison do?
faq.answer: Southern California Edison provides electricity to millions of customers in Southern California and is committed to promoting sustainability and clean energy.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Southern California Edison?
faq.answer: Pedro Pizarro is the CEO of Southern California Edison.

faq.question: Where is Southern California Edison headquartered?
faq.answer: Southern California Edison is headquartered in Rosemead, California, USA.

faq.question: What are the main services offered by Southern California Edison?
faq.answer: Southern California Edison offers residential and commercial electricity supply, renewable energy programs, and energy efficiency initiatives.

faq.question: When was Southern California Edison founded?
faq.answer: Southern California Edison was founded in 1905.
